column4: can someone help me with sound in Hoary, I fresh installed today and I cannot seem to get any sound, I've got a VIA 8235 AC97 onboard sound, all the modules appear to be loaded and no channels are muted, any pointers on where to look would be greatly appreciated.
paste the output from ,,amixer'' onto http://pastebin.com
just paste amixer output to pastebin
done
unmute PCM and mute IEC958 Capture Monitor
I cannot mute IEC958... but unmuting PCM did nothing.
you need to follow my directions
both of those settings must be toggled
use amixer
I cannot toggle the iec setting with alsamixer
not alsamixer, amixer
thanks
didnt know about amixer :)
it sounds distorted
make sure the pcm level isn't up too high
the sound is distorted regardless of the levels I set
with esd or alsa direct?
it was esd
try using alsa directly instead of using esd
sans esd everything sounds great
thanks a lot for all the help.
